thread.title: A Tennessee town braces for Trump's new tariffs

title: A Tennessee town braces for Trump's new tariffs
text:
A Tennessee town braces for Trump's new trade tariffs 5:54am EST - 02:19 
Residents of Clarksville, Tennessee are nervous about Trump's new tariffs as construction begins on a new LG washing machine factory, that is expected to generate hundreds of jobs. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Residents of Clarksville, Tennessee are nervous about Trump's new tariffs as construction begins on a new LG washing machine factory, that is expected to generate hundreds of jobs.
